Class AbstractView<T extends AbstractUniqueId>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractView<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountView, TransactionView

    public abstract class AbstractView<T extends AbstractUniqueId>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for the views. It's main functionality is to share the user's current selection on a given view to the other views. This allows the view to update the transaction table whenever the user selects a new account without requiring any external function calls.\n Each time a new view is created, it adds itself to a private static array. Whenever modifications are made to the current selection, each view in the array then updates itself accordingly.
